abstract: I’ve been away on vacation the past week, but while I was gone, Anheuser-Busch and its lawyers at Skadden Arps Slate Meagher & Flom have apparently been quite busy. They managed to cobble together a defense of the St. Louis-based brewer, which brings us Budweiser beer and is the target of an unwanted takeover offer from Belgium-based InBev.
